Posts.Content: Apr 26, 2011 02:16PM bobsgirl wrote: I finished my rads last Wednesday,  April 20.  Coincidentally, I was diagnosed with Shingles on the same day.  :(  I started having pain on Saturday, April 16.  Blisters showed up on Monday, but I didn't think Shingles because I had them in 5 different spots along my leg and foot.  My GP doc told me it was shingles on Wednesday afternoon, much to my dismay!  I started anti-virals that night, and I started to feel better, pain wise, on Friday.  I still have some nerve zingers, but the rash itself is starting to scab over and not hurt so badly anymore.  However, I am exhausted.  I'm sure it's a combo of the radiation and shingles.  :(
Posts.Title: Shingles >:-( lago Teka

Posts.Content: Feb 13, 2011 09:51PM bobsgirl wrote: When everyone's hair started to grow back, did their scalp hurt?  I'm 24 days PFC, and my scalp is achy and a bit itchy.  The sensation reminds me of when my hair fell out last October.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: bobsgirl wrote: I was wondering if anyone didn't lose all the hair on their head?  I've got some serious bald spots, but over half of my head, I've still got thick hair (cannot see my scalp).  I've done 2 treatment of TC.  My first was 9/30 and the second was 10/21.  My hair started to fall out about 2 weeks after my first treatment.  I had my husband buzz my head, but we cut it only to about a 1/2 inch long.  My hair loss has slowly considerably to the point that when I wash my head, hardly any hair falls out anymore.   I will start Adriamycin along with TC for my next treatment on 11/18.  Should I expect more hair to fall out?   I guess I was expecting to be bald at this point.  Thanks for any feedback! Diagnosed @ 36 while nursing my 4th child, pCR (2/9/11) Dx 9/17/2010, IDC, Left, 3cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- (FISH) Chemotherapy 9/30/2010 Adriamycin (doxorubicin), Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Surgery 2/4/2011 Lumpectomy: Left Radiation Therapy 3/7/2011 Breast Surgery 10/23/2012 Reconstruction (left) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Haven't lost all my hair...will I? bobsgirl calamtykel
